'''Gundahar Bolger''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Gundahar was the head of the [[Bolger Family]] after his father, [[Gundolpho Bolger|Gundolpho]]. He married [[Dina Diggle]], and had two children, [[Adalgar Bolger|Adalgar]] and [[Adaldrida Bolger|Adaldrida]].<ref>{{App|Bolger}}</ref>

== Etymology ==
''Gundahar'' is an Old German name, derived from the elements ''gunda'' "war" and ''heri'' "army". This was the name of a semi-legendary 5th-century Burgundian king. He appears in the medieval German saga the ''Nibelungenlied''.
